analysis.description:
WOLFEXDistribution.finishTokenMinting (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol#681-684) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol#684)

WOLFEXDistribution.finishDistribution (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol)

WOLFEXDistribution.bulkTokenMint has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.mint(beneficiaries[i],amount)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol#626-627)

WOLFEXDistribution.bulkTokenMint has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.mint(beneficiaries[i],amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/38/0x34623cc4d7941b88f13f772422b417edfeebfd9e.sol#638-640)

WOLFEXDistribution.bulkTokenSend has external calls inside a loop:

WOLFEXDistribution.bulkTokenSend has external calls inside a loop:
